title: Day 1123
content:
# Day 1123

Today I had a 1 on 1 with the bossman who is going viral and has now become a "creatine influencoor". So like any smart employee would do I started the meeting by taking 10 gs of creatine. Now Bitcoin Twitter is literally out here turning into creatine Twitter. Some of my favorite tweets below.

![[https://x.com/fitcoiner/status/1913365261727527414](https://x.com/fitcoiner/status/1913365261727527414)](https://miro.medium.com/1*yfi1Jk5aoQgmY3FC2Cxv8Q.png)

![[https://x.com/DzambhalaHODL/status/1913381786182205791](https://x.com/DzambhalaHODL/status/1913381786182205791)](https://miro.medium.com/1*DKcVEfKro_-xNjbo_uY4VQ.png)

![[https://x.com/thetrocro/status/1913417075328254127](https://x.com/thetrocro/status/1913417075328254127)](https://miro.medium.com/1*Q-yFrWAwsgqd7J-oGNSJNQ.png)

![[https://x.com/ConorChepenik/status/1913433937122050198](https://x.com/ConorChepenik/status/1913433937122050198)](https://miro.medium.com/1*h4v5ykO0G3ACjqcFq5Xheg.png)

![[https://x.com/Bquittem/status/1913419547190714732](https://x.com/Bquittem/status/1913419547190714732)](https://miro.medium.com/1*RuF9_ND7dwnKmxu6HJXHKg.png)

![[https://x.com/Bquittem/status/1912547229446844918](https://x.com/Bquittem/status/1912547229446844918)](https://miro.medium.com/1*WOuS17PaHTu902cn3RlfmA.png)

I had to end with the original post that kicked it all off. Gosh I love Bitcoin (now creatine) Twitter ðŸ˜‚

4/18/25

Conor Jay Chepenik
